title: Visual Notetaking-Based STEM Teacher Capacity-Building Program for Elementary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in elementary science education and experience with digital device applications
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening educational design competencies through visual thinking and conceptual structuring in mobile microlearning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically structure scientific concepts using visual notetaking techniques
Learners can enhance their ability to design visual activities that promote reflective/divergent thinking
Learners can complete inclusive science lesson design projects reflecting diverse learner identities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
